Class WorkSet<Result>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bigshot.mp.WorkSet<Result>

  • public abstract class WorkSet<Result>
extends Object
    A work set abstraction.

      WorkSet()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract List<Future<Result>> complete()
      Completes all submitted callables and returns the results as Futures.
      static <Result> WorkSet<Result> create()
      Creates a new work set.
      abstract void execute(Callable<Result> callable)
      Submits a callable for execution.
      abstract List<Result> join()
      Completes all submitted callables, also in the calling thread if possible, and returns the results.
      abstract void parallelFor(int a, int b, ParallelFor<Result> pfor)
      Executes a parallel for in this work set.
      static <Result> List<Result> pfor(int a, int b, ParallelFor<Result> pfor)
      Convenience method to execute a parallel for in a work set.
      static void setFactory(WorkSetFactory factory)
      Set the factory implementation to use.
